mapper.select: SELECT ca.*, cl.CLASSNAME, cl.PRICE FROM ALTO_CART ca, ALTO_CLASS cl WHERE ca.GOODS_CODE = cl.CLASS_CODE AND MEM_ID = #{mem_id} AND GOODS_TYPE = 'class'
SELECT ca.*, i.ITEM_NAME, i.PRICE FROM ALTO_CART ca, ALTO_ITEM i WHERE ca.GOODS_CODE = i.ITEM_CODE AND MEM_ID = #{mem_id} AND GOODS_TYPE = 'item'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALTO_CART (CART_NUM, MEM_ID, GOODS_TYPE, GOODS_CODE, QUANTITY) VALUES(seq_cart.NEXTVAL, #{mem_id}, #{goods_type}, #{goods_code}, #{quantity})
